subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Marino birdied three of his opening four holes, never had a par putt longer than 5 feet and finished his round with an 8-foot birdie to lead a round for only the second time in his career.
snippet: Steve Marino birdied three of his opening four holes, never had a par putt longer than 5 feet and finished his round with an 8-foot birdie to lead a round for only the second time in his career.
